com.psddev.dari.util
Interface StorageItem

All Superinterfaces:
SettingsBackedObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractStorageItem, AmazonStorageItem, BrightcoveStorageItem, CloudStorageItem, LocalStorageItem, UrlStorageItem
public interface StorageItem
extends SettingsBackedObject

Item in a storage system. Typically, this is used to reference a file in a remote service such as Amazon S3.

Nested Class Summary
static class StorageItem.Static
          Storage item utility methods.
 
Field Summary
static String DEFAULT_STORAGE_SETTING
          Setting key for default storage name.
static String SETTING_PREFIX
          Setting key for all storage configuration.

          Returns the data stream.
 Map<String,Object> getMetadata()
          Returns the collection of metadata.
 String getPath()
          Returns the path that can uniquely identify this item within the storage system.
 String getPublicUrl()
          Returns the URL for accessing this item publicly.
 String getSecurePublicUrl()
          Returns the URL for accessing this item securely and publicly.

          Returns the storage name.
